text: The 2016 Grand Prix Cycliste de Québec is the 7th edition of the Grand Prix Cycliste de Québec road bicycle race. The race took place on 9 September 2016, and was won by Peter Sagan in the sprint before Greg Van Avermaet and Anthony Roux.http://www.uci.ch/road/calendar/#date=20160801&view;=list&categ;=300&country;=0&classc;=0 == Teams == The 18 UCI World Tour teams are automatically entitled and obliged to start the race.
